byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Pres Obama's national security adviser Susan E Rice and American ambassador to United Nations Samantha Power will speak at American Israel Public Affairs Committee conference in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Samantha Power, the American ambassador to the United Nations, and Susan E. Rice, the national security official, will address a meeting of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee, or Aipac.

headline.main: Obama Sends Top Officials to Address Jewish Group
headline.print_headline: Obama Sends Top Officials to Address Jewish Group

snippet: Samantha Power, the American ambassador to the United Nations, and Susan E. Rice, the national security official, will address a meeting of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee, or Aipac.
